DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether the Seroquel XR treatment for 6 months improve the relapse prevention in schizophrenic outpatients
DOC.brief_title: Seroquel XR in Schizophrenia Relapse Prevention
DOC.criteria: Schizophrenic outpatients on at least 600 mg Seroquel XR treatment for at least 1 month Severe cerebro and cardiovascular disease, severe hepatic impairment, gravidity
